entry.title: Shinjuku Skyline・新宿の夜景
entry.content:
Overcast evening shot looking down Chuo Dori Street in West Shinjuku. The Cocoon Tower is in the distance center-left; the Tokyo Government office is the tall building at right.

曇った夜の新宿の中央通りの写真。遠いのビル「モード学園コクーンタワー」、右側は東京都庁。
entry.summary: Overcast evening shot looking down Chuo Dori Street in West Shinjuku. The Cocoon Tower is in the distance center-left; the Tokyo Government office is the tall building at right.

entry.title: Pontocho・先斗町
entry.content:
A single woman walks down Pontocho, a usually bustling alley of restaurants and bars. Due to Coronavirus-related restrictions on hours and alcohol, it's quiet this evening; perfect for a photographer looking for a clear shot.

一人の女性が先斗町を歩きます。 それは通常、レストランやバーのにぎやかな通りです。 しかし、新コロナウイルスに関連した時間とアルコールの制限のため、今夜は静かです。 シンプルな写真をお探しの写真家に最適です。
entry.summary: A single woman walks down Pontocho, a usually bustling alley of restaurants and bars. Due to Coronavirus-related restrictions on hours and alcohol, it's quiet this evening; perfect for a photographer looking for a clear shot.

entry.title: Rissei/Gate Hotel Project・立誠小学校プロジェクト

link.title: Rissei/Gate Hotel Project・立誠小学校プロジェクト

entry.content:
The recently opened Gate Hotel Kyoto on the grounds of the 100 year old Rissei Elementary School.

The original school building (right) has been preserved as a community center. A grassy area (left) next to the Takase River is a nice gathering spot, with coffee shops adjacent.

旧立誠小学校の所で、現祭公開のゲートホテル京都高瀬川。

右、旧校舎が公民館を使用されています。左、草な「立誠広場」です。
entry.summary: The recently opened Gate Hotel Kyoto on the grounds of the 100 year old Rissei Elementary School. The original school building (right) has been preserved as a community center. A grassy area (left) next to the Takase River is a nice gathering spot, with coffee shops adjacent.
